projects.name: JARVIS - A.I. Desktop Voice Assistant
projects.description: Developed a desktop voice assistant using SAPI 5, Python, HTML, and CSS. Implemented voice command functionalities for performing basic tasks and conversational abilities. Integrated several APIs and modules, resulting in a user-friendly interface and enhanced user interaction.

projects.name: Predicting the Internet AD Clicks Using Machine Learning
projects.description: We have used Internet Ad Dataset. Also Visualized the Data. Built a Ensembled ML Algo using Votings Classifier. Achieved 86% accuracy.

projects.name: Bengaluru Home Price Prediction
projects.description: Developed a predictive model to forecast home prices in Bangalore based on factors such as location, property type, and amenities. Implemented a user-friendly interface for interacting with the model. Achieved a prediction accuracy of 85% aiding real estate decision-making.

projects.name: Basic Resource Monitor using Python
projects.description: Developed a System Resource Monitor project to generate basic insights for monitoring and analyzing the resource utilization of computer systems. Collected data on various system resources, including CPU usage, memory consumption, disk activity, and network traffic. Presented resource utilization information in a user-friendly graphical interface. Provided valuable insights into the systems performance.
